name: License required for private trade, vocational, or technical school
text: §302A-425  License required for private trade, vocational, or technical school.  No private trade, vocational, or technical school shall be operated by any person or persons, firm, or any other private organization or corporation for the purpose of teaching any trade, occupation, or vocation unless there is first secured from the department a license issued in accordance with sections 302A-424 to 302A-428 and in such form as the department may direct.  The purpose of the licensing and regulation is to protect consumers against practices by private trade, vocational, or technical schools that are false, deceptive, misleading, or unfair, and to help ensure adequate educational quality at private trade, vocational, or technical schools. [L 1996, c 89, pt of §2; am L 1998, c 57, §1]
